summary:
Graduated theatre director and pedagogue, with  eight years of experience in directing, teaching and developing theatre- and art- projects, last three years also in socially sensitive communities. 
Serious interest in creating new connections between art, social issues and community work. 
Studying for dramatherapist, developing performing skills.

Other skills in: dramaturgy, concept-development, coaching young (theatre) artists, research & writing, translation (in spoken and written word). 

I developed artistic experience in directing and teaching in theatre, with a focus on staging new written plays. I have a love for language, movement, visual arts and locations with a history. 
I have good pedagogical competencies  in guiding people of all kind –from theatre professionals to little children in rural areas- in discovering their creative sources. I gathered knowledge and experience in implementing community-projects in sensitive social environments with special needs like  the post war region of Srebrenica.

Possible functions: project development and projectleader in directing and/or pedagogical functions in theatre and art projects.
Also serious interest for functions in other fields, i.a. :
Dramaturgy/programming/coaching/translation/research & writing.
 
I speak and can work in  Dutch, German, English and French - possible to work and live Europe wide.

profile_positions.company: Stichting Hotel Eldorado, Master Artist Educator, Pauluschurch
profile_positions.description:
With my own organization Hotel Eldorado I develop theatre-projects on the issues of collective identity and mechanisms of exclusion and conflict.
At the Imae, International Master Artist Educator, I am teaching on (social) identity, the concept of moral, intercultural differences and conflicttransformation via art/theatre.
At the Pauluschurch Rotterdam I lead an arts programme for irregulier migrants, people in poverty or without residency to support their creativity and make encounters with the citizens of Rotterdam via social art-projects. 
For links see of the organizations, see below
profile_positions.title: Theatredirector and dramatherapist

profile_positions.description:
Vanuit mijn stichting Hotel Eldorado ontwikkel ik theaterprojecten rondom collectieve identiteit en mechanismen van uitsluiting en conflict. In 2015 en 2016 maakte ik i.s.m. Ilil Land-Boss bij Theaterhaus Jena en de Balie Amsterdam 'Sieben Räume Unbegreifen' over recht, menselijkheid en de mechanismen achter volkerenmoord. Voor de productie bij de Balie i.s.m. Creative Court te Den Haag.

Doorlopend werk ik met Hotel Eldorado via theaterworkshops aan empowerment en (waar gewenst) dialoog rondom polarisatie, humanisering en psychosociale ondersteuning aan migranten en vluchtelingen. Van 2008 tot 2012 regelmatig in Bosnië-Herzegovina (i.s.m. Ilil land-Boss) en sinds 2015 bij 't Rotterdams Ongedocumenteerden Steunpunt en de Pauluskerk te Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Theatermaker en dramatherapeut

profile_positions.description:
Teacher at the Imae, International Master Artist Eductor on (collective) identity, conflict transformation via art. With the use of applied theatre methods like dramatherapy and Boals' Theatre of the Oppressed, I provide sessions on identity, intercultural differences, the concept of moral, and humanizing the so called 'Other' via a model of conflict transformation. I'm tutor for two students. 

"If art is to change the world, then artists must become agents of change" - John Johnston, Head of Programme
profile_positions.title: Docent International Master Artist Educator

profile_positions.description:
Ik ontwikkel een kunstprogramma voor en door de bezoekers van de Pauluskerk: irreguliere migranten en vluchtelingen, arbeidsmigranten uit midden-oost Europa en mensen in armoede of dak/thuisloos.
We ontwikkelen kunstprojecten die levenskracht en creativiteit versterken. Het programma verbindt de mensen in de marge met de andere inwoners van Rotterdam via publieke kunstprojecten waar bezoekers van de kerk actief in creëren en participeren i.s.m. R'damse culturele instellingen. Partners zijn Theater Rotterdam, Museum Boijmans van Beuningen, CBK Rotterdam, De Doelen en podium Grounds.
profile_positions.title: Coördinator Kunst en Cultuur Pauluskerk Rotterdam

profile_positions.description:
Since 2004 I worked as a freelance theatre-director at i.a. Het Lab, Festival aan de Werf, Over het IJ Festival, Frascati (Nl.), and the Shäxpir Festival in Austria. I created performances for adult and young audience, with a focus on new written plays of contemporary playwrights. I staged work of i.a. Paul Pourveur, Gerardjan Rijnders, Lot Vekemans, Annemarie Slotboom, Hannah van Wieringen, Marjolijn van Heemstra and Volker Schmidt (Austrian). I often worked site-specific and worked with other disciplines like music and video. 
I built experience in combining different disciplines and in the co-operation with other artists (composers/designers/video-artists), next to middle-large production processes, with groups of 6 to 9 actors and crew.

profile_positions.description:
Since 2008 I work as a guest teacher at the Theatre Academy of Maastricht. I staged work of Sarah Kane, Dea Loher and Maurice Maeterlinck with adult students of the part-time studies for Pedagogue/Director. In 2012 I was a guest teacher for the first year acting-students of the Theatre Academy of Arnhem - I coached and directed them in writing and performing their self written monologues at Festival Motel Mozaïque in Rotterdam.

I am currently training with Russian Master Anatoli Vassiliev to develop further in the pedagogics of acting and directing, and to develop myself as performer.
